TypeSignature.Value: .class nested public auto ansi beforefieldinit LinkLabel/LinkCollection extends System.Object implements class System.Collections.ICollection, class System.Collections.IEnumerable, class System.Collections.IList
type LinkLabel.LinkCollection = class interface IList interface ICollection interface IEnumerable

summary.span: 表示 控制項中的連結集合。

span.span: Represents the collection of links within a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別會儲存在顯示的連結控制項。The class stores the link displayed in the control. 集合中的每個項目是的執行個體類別，定義連結的資訊。Each item in the collection is an instance of the class, which defines the information of the link. 方法讓您能夠新增單一至集合。The method provides the ability to add a single to the collection. 若要移除的連結，您可以使用方法或方法，如果您知道連結位於集合。To remove links, you can use either the method or the method if you know where the link is located within the collection. 方法可讓您移除而不是使用集合中的所有連結方法一次都移除一個連結。The method enables you to remove all links from the collection instead of using the method to remove a single link at a time. 方法和屬性的加入和移除項目，除了也提供方法來尋找集合中的連結。In addition to methods and properties for adding and removing items, the also provides methods to find links within the collection. 方法可讓您判斷是否是集合的成員。The method enables you to determine whether a is a member of the collection. 一旦您知道連結位於集合中，您可以使用方法，以判斷連結位於集合。Once you know that the link is located within the collection, you can use the method to determine where the link is located within the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 無法建立這個類別的執行個體，而不將它與控制項。An instance of this class cannot be created without associating it with a control.

param.span: 標籤文字中的起始字元，連結便於該處建立。

span.span: The starting character within the text of the label where the link is created.

param.name: length
param.span: 起始字元之後，要包含在連結文字中的字元數。

span.span: The number of characters after the starting character to include in the link text.

summary.span: 將連結加入集合中。

span.span: Adds a link to the collection.

returns.span: ，表示已建立並且加入集合中的連結。

span.span: A representing the link that was created and added to the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A控制項可以顯示在控制項文字內的多個連結。A control can display multiple links within the text of the control. 方法可讓您將內的文字轉換控制項的連結，可以執行類似的工作，使用者按一下控制項。The method enables you to convert text within the control to a link that can be clicked on by the user to perform tasks similar to a control. 此方法會將用來連結針對。This method adds the link that is created to the for the . 比方說，如果您想要設定的字組的 「 快速 」 在標籤文字中，"The quick brown fox 」，您呼叫這個方法時`start`參數設定的值為四 （4) 和`length`參數，以五 （5)。For example, if you want to set the word "quick" in the label text, "The quick brown fox", you call this method with the `start` parameter set to the value of four (4), and the `length` parameter to five (5). 「 快速 」 然後變更為連結和這個字就加至集合。The word "quick" then changes to a link and the link is added to the collection. 如果您想要關聯資訊的連結，例如顯示或當使用者按一下連結開啟檔案的 URL 使用另一個版本方法。If you want to associate information with the link, such as the URL to display or a file to open when the user clicks on the link, use the other version of the method. > [!NOTE] > 兩個連結不能共用相同的文字。Two links cannot share the same text. 如果您建立一個連結，會使用已經由另一個連結的文字時，會擲回例外狀況。If you create a link that uses text that is already used by another link, an exception is thrown. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何設定屬性使用列舉型別。The following example demonstrates setting the property using the enumeration. 它也會示範設定， ，並屬性，並將項目加入。It also demonstrates setting the , , and properties and adding items to a . 若要執行此範例中，將它貼在空白表單並呼叫`InitializeLinkLabel`從表單的建構函式或`Load`方法。To run this example, paste it in a blank form and call `InitializeLinkLabel` from the form's constructor or `Load` method. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabelExample#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabelExample/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabelExample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabelExample/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabelExample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabelExample/VB/form1.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks A控制項可以顯示在控制項文字內的多個連結。A control can display multiple links within the text of the control. 方法可讓您將內的文字轉換控制項的連結，可以執行類似的工作，使用者按一下控制項。The method enables you to convert text within the control to a link that can be clicked on by the user to perform tasks similar to a control. 此方法會將用來連結針對。This method adds the link that is created to the for the . 比方說，如果您想要設定的字組的 「 快速 」 在標籤文字中，"The quick brown fox 」，您呼叫這個方法時`start`參數設定的值為四 （4) 和`length`參數，以五 （5)。For example, if you want to set the word "quick" in the label text, "The quick brown fox", you call this method with the `start` parameter set to the value of four (4), and the `length` parameter to five (5). 「 快速 」 然後變更為連結和這個字就加至集合。The word "quick" then changes to a link and the link is added to the collection. 這個版本的 Add 方法可讓您提供其他資訊可透過連結相關聯`linkData`參數。This version of the Add method enables you to provide additional information that can be associated with the link through the `linkData` parameter. 例如，您可以傳遞至`linkData`參數，其中包含當按下連結時要顯示的 URL。For example, you can pass a to the `linkData` parameter that contains a URL to display when the link is clicked. 您接著可以使用這項資訊中的處理常式事件的控制項在 Microsoft Internet Explorer 中顯示的 URL。You can then use this information in your handler for the event of the control to display the URL in Microsoft Internet Explorer. > [!NOTE] > 兩個連結不能共用相同的文字。Two links cannot share the same text. 如果您建立一個連結，會使用已經由另一個連結的文字時，會擲回例外狀況。If you create a link that uses text that is already used by another link, an exception is thrown. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立顯示連結，並在預設瀏覽器中顯示 Microsoft 網站上，按一下控制項的文字中所定義的連結時的控制項。The following code example creates a control that displays a link, and displays the Microsoft Web site in the default browser when the link defined in the control's text is clicked. 此範例會定義的方法，初始化也會處理的方法控制控制項事件。The example defines a method that initializes the control as well as a method that will handle the event of the control. 事件處理常式事件會使用屬性類別，以判斷要在預設瀏覽器中顯示的 URL。The event handler of the event uses the property of the class to determine the URL to display in the default browser. 這個範例需要它位於內類別。This example requires that it is located within a class. [!code-cpp[LinkLabel Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/LinkLabel Overview/CPP/linklabelex.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[LinkLabel Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/LinkLabel Overview/CS/linklabelex.cs#1)] [!code-vb[LinkLabel Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/LinkLabel Overview/VB/linklabelex.vb#1)]
